00011 template <class T>
00012 class StiCompositeLeafIterator
00013 {
00014 public:
00015     typedef StiCompositeTreeNode<T> tnode_t;
00016     typedef vector<tnode_t*> tnode_vec;
00017     
00018     StiCompositeLeafIterator(tnode_t* node);
00019     virtual ~StiCompositeLeafIterator();
00020     
00021     //Reset iterator to first leaf
00022     void reset();
00023     
00024     //Dereference iterator, ala STL
00025     tnode_t* operator*() const;
00026     
00027     //Define only prefix of ++ (only a forward iterator)
00028     void operator++();
00029     
00030     //Define !=
00031     bool operator!=(const tnode_vec::const_iterator&);
00032     
00033     unsigned int getLeafCount() const;
00034     
00035 public:
00036     //Safe forward Access to leaves
00037     tnode_vec::const_iterator const_begin() const;
00038     tnode_vec::const_iterator const_end() const;
00039     
00040 protected:
00041     StiCompositeLeafIterator(); //not implemented
00042     void findLeaves();
00043     
00044     tnode_t* mcurrentnode;
00045     tnode_vec::const_iterator mcurrentleaf;
00046     tnode_vec mleaves;
00047     
00048 private:
00049 };

00051 template <class T>
00052 StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::StiCompositeLeafIterator(tnode_t* node) : mcurrentnode(node) 
00053 {
00054     findLeaves();
00055 }
00056 
00057 template <class T>
00058 StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::~StiCompositeLeafIterator()
00059 {
00060 }
00061 
00062 template <class T>
00063 inline void StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::reset()
00064 {
00065     mcurrentleaf=mleaves.begin();
00066 }
00067 
00068 template <class T>
00069 inline StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::tnode_t* StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::operator*() const
00070 {
00071     return (*mcurrentleaf);
00072 }
00073 
00074 template <class T>
00075 inline void StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::operator ++()
00076 {
00077     ++mcurrentleaf;
00078 }
00079 
00080 template <class T>
00081 inline bool StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::operator != (const tnode_vec::const_iterator& rhs) 
00082 {
00083     return (mcurrentleaf != rhs);
00084 }
00085 
00086 template <class T>
00087 inline unsigned int StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::getLeafCount() const 
00088 {
00089     return mleaves.size();
00090 }
00091 
00092 template <class T>
00093 inline StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::tnode_vec::const_iterator //return type
00094 StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::const_begin() const
00095 {
00096     return mleaves.begin();
00097 }
00098 
00099 template <class T>
00100 inline StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::tnode_vec::const_iterator //return type
00101 StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::const_end() const
00102 {
00103     return mleaves.end();
00104 }
00105 
00106 template <class T>
00107 void StiCompositeLeafIterator<T>::findLeaves() 
00108 {
00109     LeafFinder<T> myLeafFinder(mleaves);
00110     myLeafFinder(mcurrentnode);
00111     reset();
00112 }
